argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | pwssca.y | |- Y = ( R ^s I ) |
| 2 |  | pwssca.s | |- S = ( Scalar ` R ) |
| 3 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( S Xs_ ( I X. { R } ) ) = ( S Xs_ ( I X. { R } ) ) |
| 4 |  | #P_fvex | |- ( Scalar ` R ) e. _V |
| 5 | 2, 4 | #P_eqeltri | |- S e. _V |
| 6 | 5 | #P_a1i | |- ( ( R e. V /\ I e. W ) -> S e. _V ) |
| 7 |  | #P_simpr | |- ( ( R e. V /\ I e. W ) -> I e. W ) |
| 8 |  | #P_snex | |- { R } e. _V |
| 9 |  | #P_xpexg | |- ( ( I e. W /\ { R } e. _V ) -> ( I X. { R } ) e. _V ) |
| 10 | 7, 8, 9 | #P_sylancl | |- ( ( R e. V /\ I e. W ) -> ( I X. { R } ) e. _V ) |
| 11 | 3, 6, 10 | #P_prdssca | |- ( ( R e. V /\ I e. W ) -> S = ( Scalar ` ( S Xs_ ( I X. { R } ) ) ) ) |
| 12 | 1, 2 | #P_pwsval | |- ( ( R e. V /\ I e. W ) -> Y = ( S Xs_ ( I X. { R } ) ) ) |
| 13 | 12 | #P_fveq2d | |- ( ( R e. V /\ I e. W ) -> ( Scalar ` Y ) = ( Scalar ` ( S Xs_ ( I X. { R } ) ) ) ) |
| 14 | 11, 13 | #P_eqtr4d | |- ( ( R e. V /\ I e. W ) -> S = ( Scalar ` Y ) ) |
